title: New: Vessel – Scarletta / Metle
body:
With the news that **[Vessel](http://soundcloud.com/vessel)** has just signed to [TriAngle Records](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tri-Angle-Records/333284212000) only just becoming little fetuses in my ears, I went to my bedroom and hi-fived myself to fuck. I’m a happy man, not only is the pairing a perfect patch, but Vessel’s music is becoming increasingly contorted and gleefully bent on fucking with one’s reality.

Stream his 2 brand new demonically industrialized gems below.

Scarletta is due out on TriAngle later this year.
